attributes.action: Demand a general election before the end of 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand Gordon Browns immediate resignation .
We do not accept that Prime minister Brown has a mandate from the British people to continue making decisions on Britains future ,such as the signing of the Lisbon treaty ( European constitution ).
We do not accept Gordon Browns right to govern as Tony Blaires heir.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
